name: Universidad Nacional de Educacion a Distancia
display_name: Universidad Nacional de Educacion a Distancia
description: The Spanish Open University, UNED, is a large institution: the largest university in Spain with over 180,000 students; with a range of studies covering 26 degree courses and over five hundred training courses; and with almost 10,000 people who, from the Head Office and 60 Associated Centers, 80 extensions and a large group of support centers distributed all over the country, work hard to support on a daily basis the path taken by its student towards meeting their educational and training goals. This work also extends to different Support Centers overseas, located in 14 different countries, handling more than 1800 students.
